thread.title: Floyd Mayweather v Conor McGregor: Irishman ordered to sort out UFC issues by Mayweather | Metro News
thread.title_full: Floyd Mayweather v Conor McGregor: Irishman ordered to sort out UFC issues by Mayweather | Metro News

author: Coral Barry For Metro.Co.Uk
title: Floyd Mayweather v Conor McGregor: Irishman ordered to sort out UFC issues by Mayweather | Metro News
text:
Coral Barry for Metro.co.uk Wednesday 15 Feb 2017 9:19 am Floyd Mayweather is currently retired (Picture: Getty) 
Floyd Mayweather has fired straight back at Conor McGreogor after the UFC star’s latest taunts on social media. Conor McGregor fires final warning to UFC and Mayweather as he meets with former UFC owner 
Reports that a fight had been agreed were shot down by Mayweather on Tuesday while McGregor took credit for the boxer insisting he was still retired. 
Mayweather has now ordered McGregor to get his house in order and convince the UFC to allow the super fight. 
‘Listen, Conor McGregor, if you really want to get this fight done,’ Mayweather began. A post shared by Floyd Mayweather (@floydmayweather) on Feb 15, 2017 at 12:19am PST 
‘Take care of your business with the UFC and then have your people get in touch with my people.’ 
McGregor is in Las Vegas to film an anti-bullying video, but Mayweather wants the Irishman to use the trip to sort out the issues surrounding the fight. Conor McGregor is a two-weight champion in the UFC (Picture: Getty)
